scripts.migrate:dev: NODE_ENV=development sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && NODE_ENV=development sequelize db:migrate
scripts.migrate:prod: NODE_ENV=production sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && NODE_ENV=production sequelize db:migrate
scripts.migrate:test: NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:migrate
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test npm run migrate:test && jest --forceExit --coverage && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js
